statements: UPDATE user_preferences SET vr_experience_preference = 'On', theme_preference = 'Dark' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_preferences SET control_settings = '{"sensitivity": 5, "invert_controls": true}', theme_preference = 'Light' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_preferences SET vr_experience_preference = 'gaming', theme_preference = 'dark' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_preferences SET control_settings = '{"sensitivity": 5, "invert_y_axis": true}', vr_experience_preference = 'education' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_preferences SET username = 'Alice', vr_experience_preferences = '{"setting1": true}' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_settings SET controller_settings = '{"sensitivity": 0.8}', language = 'English' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE user_preferences SET vr_experience_preferences = '{"preferred_devices": ["Oculus Rift", "HTC Vive"], "notification_settings": {"email": true, "push": false}}' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_settings SET language = 'Spanish', theme = 'Dark', controller_settings = '{"sensitivity": 50, "key_mappings": {"up": "W", "down": "S", "left": "A", "right": "D"}}' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE UserPreferences SET display_settings = '{"theme": "light"}', audio_settings = '{"volume": 80}' WHERE user_id = '8d0cfb5b-487d-44b4-a9a3-f3f33a77f797';
UPDATE VRActivities SET duration_minutes = 45, activity_type = 'fitness' WHERE activity_id = 3;
UPDATE UserPreferences SET display_settings = '{"theme": "dark", "font_size": 14}' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE VRActivities SET activity_name = 'Virtual Reality Game', duration_minutes = 60 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';
UPDATE UserPreferences SET preferred_language = 'English' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE VRSettings SET resolution = '1920x1080', quality = 80 WHERE vr_experience = 'Virtual Reality';
UPDATE UserPreferences SET preferred_timezone = 'America/New_York', preferred_language = 'English' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE VRSettings SET quality = 2, resolution = '1920x1080' WHERE vr_experience = 'Immersive';
UPDATE UserPreferences SET theme='dark' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE DeviceSettings SET brightness=80, volume=50 WHERE user_id=2 AND device_id=3;
UPDATE UserPreferences SET theme = 'Dark' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE DeviceSettings SET brightness = 80, volume = 60 WHERE user_id = 3 AND device_id = 5;
